participant_1.background:

i know how to count cards in blackjack.
i love going to the gym.
I have my priorities straight and don't feel the need to impress others.
I just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies for my family.

participant_2.background:
I am raising my kids on my own.
i am a psychology major.
i am too short to reach the top shelf.
i am angry at my coworker.
My pets are a good way to keep my mind off of my divorce.

content.text: Hey, I'm new here. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music. I recently got into VV Nation.
Oh, nice! I used to listen to them a lot when I was a kid.
Really? What did you like about them?
I liked their upbeat sound and their lyrics. They always put me in a good mood.
Yeah, they're really good at that. I've been listening to their music a lot lately to keep my mind off of my divorce.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope things get better for you.
Thanks. It's been tough, but I'm trying to stay positive.
That's good to hear. I'm sure things will get better.
Thanks. I hope so too.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a psychology major.
Oh, that's cool. What do you want to do with your degree?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going into counseling.
That's a great field. I know a lot of people who have been helped by counselors.
Yeah, I think it would be a good way to help people.
Well, I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thanks. I hope so.
So, what are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. I might go for a walk with my dog.
That sounds like a good idea. I love taking walks with my dog.
Me too. It's a great way to get some exercise and spend time with your pet.
Exactly. It's a win-win situation
